name: Asian Pork Lettuce Wraps with Coconut-Lime Rice
author: Allrecipes Allstars
summary: This Allrecipes Allstars team proved that whipping up a delicious pork recipe doesn't take long. Ready in just over half an hour, this winner comes from community members Baking Nana (Penny Hanstad), Elizabeth (Elizabeth Comisar), and Staci (Staci Maddox).
ingredients: ½ cup diced red bell pepper
1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
directions: Bring water and salt to a boil in a saucepan over high heat
Reduce heat, and simmer, covered, until water is absorbed, about 20 minutes
Meanwhile, brown pork in a large skillet over medium-high heat, stirring to break up lumps, 5 to 7 minutes
Transfer pork to a plate; drain grease from the skillet
Heat oil in the skillet over medium-high heat
Stir in onion, bell pepper, carrot, water chestnuts, and ginger; cook, stirring, until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes
Stir in pork, teriyaki, and honey; cook, stirring, until liquid has evaporated, 3 to 5 minutes
Fluff cooked rice with a fork, then fold in 1/4 cup cilantro, coconut milk, and lime juice
Top lettuce leaves with pork mixture and rice
Garnish with lime wedges and chopped fresh cilantro
